XML_TEMPLATES.name: sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl
XML_TEMPLATES.constructorDescription: Constructs a new SearchCompositeControl to interact with SAP Enterprise Search Services.
XML_TEMPLATES.helpDescription: This is the SAPUI5 composite control by the Enterprise Search Team which helps to make full use of the Enterprise Search Engine features built into ABAP and HANA. It includes a search input box including a suggestion dropdown, a result view which can have different visualisation, including tiles, list and table, filtering facets and more. This control is ready to use with an enterprise search backend service but also allows deep extension to match requirements of adopting applications.
